About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I was born and raised in Tampere Finland and being always interested in technology, computers and computer programs, it is not a surprise that I ended studying software engineering at the University of tampere.
I am currently on my fifth year at the University and about to start writing my master thesis. I am also trying to start my career as a software engineer. My ambition is to become a front-end or fullstack developer as I have found a great interest in developing web applications.

Tampere University

BSc in Information Technology

I started my studies in 2016 and got my bachelors degree in 2020.
